Deutsch: Tang Xuanzong (geboren als Li Longji (`李隆基~li3long2ji1)  (Eig, Pers, 685 - 762)
English: Tang Emperor Xuanzong (685-762), also known as Emperor Ming of Tang `唐明皇~[Tang2 Ming2 huang2], reign name of seventh Tang emperor `李隆基~[Li3 Long1 ji1], reigned 712-756
